page.title: 14PEOPLE OF STRATHNAIRN
page.content: We tried to find out about the length of time people have lived in our area and how far away their previous homes were. {Length of residency Only 2 families have stayed here for less than 1 year,6 families from 1_5 years,4 families from 5_10 years,2 families from 10_30 years and 4 families have lived here for over 30 years. {Previous homes 6 families stayed 10 miles or less away from Farr,2 families from 10_50 miles away,7 families from over 50 miles away,2 families have lived here all their lives. {Houses 12 houses were built over 40 years ago,3 between 20 and 40 years ago,1 between 10 and 20 years ago and 2 in the last 10 years.
